email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam on FOB terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for reaching out. I can offer the MV SEA HORIZON, DWT 82,000, LOA 225m, currently available for your cargo. The starting freight quote is USD 25 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 September. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 per MT seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Given the current market conditions, I can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 96 hours. Let me know if you need any more details.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

USD 23 per MT sounds better. Can we lock in the MV SEA HORIZON with a laycan of 25-30 September? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Liam Carter
